# Law (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* | Heimdall, Surtur, Tyr |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* | Church of the Silver Flame, Aureon, Boldrei, Dol Arrah, the Blood of Vol, the Path of Light |
| | *Golarion:* | Abadar, Asmodeus, [[Erastil]], Iomedae, Irori, [[Torag]], Zon-Kuthon |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Heironeous]], [[Hextor]], [[Kurtulmak]], [[Moradin]], St. Cuthbert, Tiamat, Wee Jas, Yondalla |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* | [[Athena]], Nike |
| | *Other:* | Taiia (both aspects) |

| | *Toril:* | [[Abbathor]], Beshaba, [[Brandobaris]], [[Erevan Ilesere]], Haela Brightaxe, Mask, Oghma, Tymora, Vergadain |

**Granted Powers**: You follow a strict and ordered code of laws, and in so doing, achieve enlightenment.

- *Touch of Law (Sp)*: You can touch a willing creature as a standard action, infusing it with the power of divine order and allowing it to treat all attack rolls, skill checks, ability checks, and saving throws for 1 round as if the natural d20 roll resulted in an 11. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
- *Staff of Order (Su)*: At 8th level, you can give a weapon touched the *[[Axiomatic (MagWpnSpcAb)|axiomatic]]* special weapon quality for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your cleric level. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and an additional time per day for every four levels beyond 8th.

**Law Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Protection From Chaos (Spell)|Protection from Chaos]]****:** +2 to AC and saves, plus additional protection against selected alignment.

**2** **[[Align Weapon (Spell)|Align Weapon]]****:** Weapon becomes lawful.

**3** **[[Magic Circle Against Chaos (Spell)|Magic Circle against Chaos]]****:** As *protection* spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 minutes/level.

**4** **[[Order's Wrath (Spell)|Orderâ€™s Wrath]]****:** Harms and dazes chaotic creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).

**5** **[[Dispel Chaos (Spell)|Dispel Chaos]]****:** +4 against attacks by chaotic creatures.

**6** **[[Hold Monster (Spell)|Hold Monster]]****:** As *[[Hold Person (Spell)|hold person]]*, but any creature.

**7** **[[Dictum (Spell)|Dictum]]****:** Kills, paralyzes, staggers, or deafens nonlawful targets.

**8** **[[Shield of Law (Spell)|Shield of Law]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** +4 to AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against chaotic spells.

**9** **[[Summon Monster IX (Spell)|Summon Monster IX]]****:** Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you. (law spell only)

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 45

                Deities and Demigods (WotC), pg. 214

                Eberron Campaign Setting (WotC), pg. 106
